trans-unit.source: No existing keyboard event in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] uses the KeyboardEventArgs.
trans-unit.target: Ingen befintlig tangentbordshändelse i [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] använder KeyboardEventArgs.

trans-unit.source: KeyboardEventArgs serves as the base class for the more specific <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs> event data classes, which are used by existing [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] events such as <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: KeyboardEventArgs fungerar som basklass för den mer specifikt <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs>och <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs>händelse dataklasser som används av befintliga [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] , och <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown?displayProperty=fullName> <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyboardEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyboardEventArgs"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: The logical keyboard device associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: Den logiska tangentbord enheten som är associerade med den här händelsen.

trans-unit.source: The time when the input occurred.
Invokes event handlers in a type-specific way, which can increase event system efficiency.
trans-unit.target: Anropar händelsehanterare på ett sätt för typspecifika, vilket kan öka effektiviteten för händelsen system.

trans-unit.source: This implementation casts the generic handler as a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardEventHandler> and then invokes it.
trans-unit.target: Den här implementeringen kastar generiska hanteraren som en <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardEventHandler>och aktiverar det.</xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: For details on this implementation pattern and the reasons for it, see <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A> and [Routed Events Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Mer information om den här implementeringen mönstret och skälen för den finns <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A>och [dirigerade händelser översikt](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A>

trans-unit.source: The generic handler to call in a type-specific way.
trans-unit.target: Allmän hanteraren att anropa på typspecifika sätt.

trans-unit.source: The target to call the handler on.
Gets the keyboard device associated with the input event.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar tangentbord som är associerade med indatahändelsen.

trans-unit.source: The logical keyboard device associated with the event.
trans-unit.target: Den logiska tangentbord enheten som är associerade med händelsen.
